summary:
The Security Council:

Recalling previous resolutions on Somalia, 
Determining the situation in Somalia remains a threat to international peace and security,

Acting under Chapter VII:

1. Authorises African Union Member States to maintain AMISOM deployment until 14 March 2021, to take necessary measures in compliance with international law, and respect Somalia's sovereignty and unity, to carry out its mandate as set out in resolution 2520 (2020);
2. Requests the Secretary-General to continue logistical support through UNSOS for UNSOM, AMISOM, and Somali security forces as set out in resolutions 2520 (2020) and 2245 (2015);
3. Decides to remain actively seized of the matter.
